skirmish.name: Battle (Core)
skirmish.description: A well-rounded force for taking on any mission.

buckler.name: Buckler
buckler.description_short: +1 Save to melee, unless in skirmish, then +1 Save.
buckler.description: +1 Save to melee only, unless in skirmish formation, in which case it gives +1 Save to ranged too.

heavy_armor.name: Heavy Armor
heavy_armor.description: This model has +2 to its Save characteristic.

sling_volley.name: Sling Volley
sling_volley.description: This model can fire twice at short range or 12 inches.

skirmisher_formation.name: Skirmisher Formation
skirmisher_formation.description_short: +1 Save to ranged hits at ranges further than 12', -1 Save to Melee
skirmisher_formation.description: +1 Save to ranged hits at ranges further than 12', -1 Save to Melee
skirmisher_formation.flavor: This unit is part of a spread out formation, which means it can more easily dodge incoming missiles, but is more vunerable to being rushed by infantry.

light_infantry.name: Light Infantry
light_infantry.description_short: Optional +1 Save to ranged hits at ranges further than 12', -1 Save to Melee
light_infantry.description: Optional +1 Save to ranged hits at ranges further than 12', -1 Save to Melee
light_infantry.flavor: This unit can choose to fight as skirmishers as a loose formation, or 'close up' to fight as traditional infantry.

warband.name: Warband
warband.description_short: +1 to attacking broken units, -1 to saves after becoming broken.
warband.description: +1 to attacking fleeing units (Failed a break test), -1 to fighting off chasing units (After it failed a break test).
warband.flavor: Warbands are units that due to a lack of professional training, are overconfident in the chase or while being fired upon, but are filled with fear when being chased or seeing the blood of their fellow countrymen.

if_it_bleeds.name: If It Bleeds
if_it_bleeds.description_short: -1 shock for being hit, +2 shock for losing one or more models.
if_it_bleeds.description: -1 shock for being hit, +2 shock for losing one or more models.
if_it_bleeds.flavor: Warbands are units that due to a lack of professional training, are overconfident in the chase or while being fired upon, but are filled with fear when being chased or seeing the blood of their fellow countrymen.

light_footed.name: Light Footed
light_footed.description: This unit gets +1 movement, typically from being a skirmisher or light infantry
light_footed.flavor: With less armor and no shield to weigh them down, these men can be quite nimble.

furious_charge.name: Furious Charge
furious_charge.description_short: Charge and win, enemy unit breaks
furious_charge.description: (Requires War Horse) If this unit charges another and 'wins' the first round of combat, the other unit has to break (Act like it failed a break test). If the other unit has 'stubborn' rule a d6, on a 1,2,or 3 the other unit breaks.
furious_charge.flavor: The fury of heavy cavalry was terrifying to those not prepared for the loud pounding of hooves and for the sheer weight of the charge.
